notes.name: Riddle
notes.description: I don't have eyes, but once I did see. Once I had thoughts, but now I'm white and empty. The answer is a skull.

notes.name: Introductory note
notes.description: We have your friend. To find your friend you must collect items around the house and decide which ones can be used. Remember, if you fail, we come for you.

notes.name: Explanation note
notes.description: To win and help save your friend, you must collect three keys. These are the only things that you can do.
